attributes.action: To educate students at school about recycling.
attributes.additional_details: So eventually in around 30/40 years time the whole country could recycle.
attributes.background: To educate students at schools about recycling so they can go home and influence their parents to recycle and their future children. This way people will start to recycle.

rejection.details: The English national curriculum for science already requires schools to teach students about earth as a source of limited resources and the efficacy of recycling: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/national-curriculum-in-england-science-programmes-of-study/national-curriculum-in-england-science-programmes-of-study
